settings.subheading: The First Portable Blender Is Now Here

settings.subtitle: HEALTHY. USEFUL.
settings.title: We are THATBLENDER™️.
settings.text:
THAT BLENDER are quality Portable Usb Mixers that give you the ability travel, work out and walk always having your healthy fruit smothies with you.

Our blenders are made with the finest materials & technology to give our customers the best experience ever.

settings.text: For a limited time, get 50%-80% off all products. This deal won't last long - get yours now before time runs out!

settings.testimonial: When I bought Vorieu Glasses, I didn't expect much for only $30. However, when I  used them, I realized that they were well worth the price.
settings.author: Jackson Zalinsky

settings.testimonial: When I take the train to work, I never have time to have breakfast, but now this blender saved my mornings. I'll be buying more for sure.
settings.author: Jessica Milone

settings.testimonial: This mixer is truly, and I mean truly, the best I have ever had. I use it when I go to the gym and it is perfect to keep my workout healthy.vMoney well spent.
settings.author: Katie McDermott
